body:
To figure out if everything worked the way I expected, I wrote a test. Things generally work how I'd expect, with clients who don't care about revisions only getting approved things, so that's cool.

I ran into one major issue, and that is that a user can approve their own approval request. I think we don't want to allow that. Besides that, I think we should change a couple HTTP 200 responses into HTTP 201. Those are minor though.

I'll push that test to this branch.

To figure out if everything worked the way I expected, I wrote a test. Things generally work how I'd expect, with clients who don't care about revisions only getting approved things, so that's cool.

I ran into one major issue, and that is that a user can approve their own approval request. I think we don't want to allow that. Besides that, I think we should change a couple HTTP 200 responses into HTTP 201. Those are minor though.

I'll push that test to this branch.
